title: Ebert & Roeper - 04.13.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  April 13th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0421073/]Street Kings[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0460745/]Chaos Theory[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0765120/]My Blueberry Nights[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0858479/]Smart People[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1047007/]Young @ Heart[/url]

--- Next Week
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0411061/]88 Minutes[/url]
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800039/]Forgetting Sarah Marshall[/url]
--- Coming Soon
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0871426/]Baby Mama[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0421073/]Street Kings[/url]  -  (LA inconsequential) down - (terrible movie) down
-- Keanu Reeves - Forest Whitaker - Hugh Laurie - Cedric the Entertainer - Common

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0460745/]Chaos Theory[/url]  -  (mild) up - (ridiculous) down
-- Ryan Reynolds - Emily Mortimer

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0765120/]My Blueberry Nights[/url]  -  down - down
-- Jude Law - Norah Jones - Rachel Weisz - Natalie Portman - David Strathairn

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0858479/]Smart People[/url]  -  down - (consistently enjoyable) up
-- Dennis Quaid - Ellen Page - Sarah Jessica Parker - Thomas Haden Church

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1047007/]Young @ Heart[/url]  -  (way) up - (amazing) up
-- documentary

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0292963/]Before the Devil Knows You&#039;re Dead[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Before-Devil-Knows-Youre-Dead/dp/B00112S8RS/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1208190021&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0467406/]Juno[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Juno-Two-Disc-Special-Digital-Copy/dp/B0014CQNTK/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1208189849&sr=1-2](amazon)[/url]

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0805564/]Lars and the Real Girl[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0422783/]Music Within[/url]  -  down - down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0391229/]I Want Someone to Eat Cheese With[/url]  -  up - up  -  ( "smart, sly, hilarious" )

	---Roeper&#039;s Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
		3 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0478087/]21[/url]
		2 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0489281/]Stop-Loss[/url]
		1 - [url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1047007/]Young @ Heart[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
Siskel & Ebert and Ebert & Roeper video reviews dating back to 1985 can be found at [url=http://www.atthemoviestv.com/]atthemoviestv.com[/url]
Free [url=http://www.apple.com/podcasting/ ]Podcasts[/url] of Ebert & Roeper are available at the [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/]iTunes Music Store[/url]
